issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement marks addAnimal(animal: Animal) as private (â€“), but the intended design (and solution code) requires addAnimal to be public so that Main and tests can call it. This visibility mismatch in the UML can confuse students about how to implement addAnimal.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility marker of addAnimal(animal: Animal) in the UML diagram to public (+) to match the template, solution, and Main usage.
